articles.description: Would you buy a FOMO fund if someone offered it to you? Some investors are betting you will.
articles.content:
Traders work on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange.
Do you have fear of missing out on all this wild trading going on this year? Would you buy a FOMO fund if someone offered it to you?

articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: China industrial output rises 35.1% year-on-year in January-February - Reuters
articles.description: China's factory and retail sector activity surged in the first two months of the year, beating expectations, as the economy consolidated its brisk recovery from the coronavirus paralysis of early 2020.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
